description: The Merrell Hut Moc 2 Sport delivers an easy on / off experience with perfect fit through elastic laces. The construction is made with recycled materials featuring a BLOOM® midsole made from 10% algae biomass transforming green water into clean water in the process. The Vegan friendly construction builds on our commitment to utilizing renewable materials in shoe construction
name: Merrell Hut Moc 2 Sport - Mens
